## Menu class

A basic menu class.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Menu 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [openingCoords](./blockly.menu.openingcoords.md) |  | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) \| null | Coordinates of the pointerdown event that caused this menu to open. Used to prevent the consequent pointerup event due to a simple click from activating a menu item immediately. |

|  --- | --- | --- |
